definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: English is the official language, but Cantonese and Malay are also spoken.
sentences.chinese: 官方語言爲英語，粵語和馬來語同樣通行。

sentences.english: They have to adulterate a Chinese sentence with words taken from English and Malay.
sentences.chinese: 一句話裏頭總是摻雜了英語單詞或馬來語詞彙。

sentences.english: The official languages are English, Mandarin, Malay and Tamil.
sentences.chinese: 官方語言是英語，華話，馬來語和泰米爾語。

sentences.english: Fluent in Bahasa Malaysia and English.
They have to adulterate a Chinese sentence with words taken from English or Malay.
sentences.chinese: 他們一句話裏頭總是摻雜了英語單詞或馬來語詞彙。

sentences.english: Being in a nation, which considers Malay language her national language, for more than ten years.
sentences.chinese: 在一個以馬來語爲國語的國度生活了十多年。

definition: Sumatra, one of the Indonesian islands
East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)

definition: Nauru, island country in the southwestern Pacific (Tw)
